stake-matic-dashboard.title: MATIC Liquid Staking
stake-matic-dashboard.unstake-eta: You will receive MATIC in about 3-4 days.

tooltip.apy:
The Annual Percentage Yield (APY) represents the average annualized earned MATIC over the last 7 days, net of delegation fees from Polygon Validator nodes.

Ankr Staking fee is 0%.

When there are at least 300 pending MATIC rewards, earned MATIC will be staked to generate compounding effect.
tooltip.fee: As unstaking MATIC tokens is a gas and time consuming process requiring sending several transactions to the MATIC smart-contracts deployed in Ethereum, Ankr Staking covers the gas fee cost and charge a modest fee in Ankr to compensate its expenses.  MATIC tokens will therefore be transfered to your wallet automatically as soon as unstake process is completed without any subsequent additional costs.

validation.is-not-enough-fee: {value} ANKR is not enough for unstaking fee. Please, buy ANKR

network-chooser.title: In which network you want stake your MATIC

stake-matic-eth.stake-info: Stake at least 1 MATIC on Ethereum network and claim the same amount of aMATICb liquid staking tokens (aMATICb) on Ethereum network (ERC-20 token). Your aMATICb balance will increase on a daily basis, simulating as such your aMATICb staking rewards.
stake-matic-eth.matic-tooltip-body:
aMATICb grows daily just being in your wallet. It represents your staked MATIC plus accumulated staking rewards.

tooltips.aETHb: Ankr Reward-Earning Staked ETH (aETHb) is a rebasing token. When holding aETHb, its balance will increase on a daily basis proportional to your ETH2 staking rewards. Therefore, the ratio of aETHb vs. ETH is always 1:1.
tooltips.aETHc: Ankr Reward-Bearing Staked ETH (ankrETH) is a reward-bearing token.Its value compared with ETH represents the redemption value of ankrETH, increasing over time to reflect ETH2 staking rewards earned.
tooltips.aBNBb: Ankr Reward-Earning Staked BNB (aBNBb) is a rebasing token. When holding aBNBb, its balance will increase on a daily basis proportional to your BNB staking rewards. Therefore, the ratio of aBNBb vs. BNB is always 1:1.
tooltips.aBNBc: Ankr Reward-Bearing Staked BNB (ankrBNB) is a reward-bearing token. Its value compared with BNB represents the redemption value of ankrBNB, increasing over time to reflect BNB staking rewards earned.
tooltips.aMATICb: Ankr Reward-Earning Staked MATIC (aMATICb) is a rebasing token. When holding aMATICb, its balance will increase on a daily basis proportional to your MATIC staking rewards. Therefore, the ratio of aMATICb vs. MATIC is always 1:1.
tooltips.aMATICc: Ankr Reward-Bearing Staked MATIC (ankrMATIC) is a reward-bearing token. Its value compared with MATIC represents the redemption value of ankrMATIC, increasing over time to reflect MATIC staking rewards earned.
tooltips.pendingTx: This may take a moment; you can close this window. Once completed you can check out your new {token} exposure on the Ankr Staking Dashboard.
tooltips.aFTMb: Ankr Reward-Earning Staked FTM (aFTMb) is a rebasing token. When holding aFTMb, its balance will increase on a daily basis proportional to your FTM staking rewards. Therefore, the ratio of aFTMb vs. FTM is always 1:1.
tooltips.aFTMc: Ankr Reward-Bearing Staked FTM (ankrFTM) is a reward-bearing token. Its value compared with FTM represents the redemption value of ankrFTM, increasing over time to reflect FTM staking rewards earned.
tooltips.aAVAXb: Ankr Reward-Earning Staked AVAX (aAVAXb) is a rebasing token. When holding aAVAXb, its balance will increase on a daily basis proportional to your AVAX staking rewards. Therefore, the ratio of aAVAXb vs. AVAX is always 1:1.

Ankr Staking covers all gas fees while charging users a modest fee to compensate expenses. MATIC tokens will be transferred to your wallet automatically when the unstaking process is complete with no additional costs.

dashboard.old-version-tooltip:
We are decommissioning an older version of the ankrETH liquid staking token on the BNB chain and switching to a new ankrETH token that will be compatible with Ankr Bridge.

To switch your ankrETH to the new version, click the “Switch” button and confirm the action in your wallet.

The process will take a few seconds, after which the new tokens will be displayed on your dashboard.

empty.title: Stake and earn with your favorite blockchains

token-info.title: What is {token}?
token-info.aAVAXb:
aAVAXb represents your staked AVAX and provides liquidity for your staked position.

aAVAXb balance in your wallet grows daily to reflect the earned rewards.

Redemption ratio is always 1 aAVAXb = 1 AVAX.

You can unstake it anytime and receive your stake and earned rewards after the 1–28 days unbonding period, depending on validator's closest unlocking date.

While staking, you can also use aAVAXb for trading and other DeFi opportunities.
token-info.aAVAXc:
ankrAVAX represents your staked FTM and provides liquidity for your staked position.

All staking rewards are built into the token price, and ankrAVAX grows daily in value, but never in number.

Redemption ratio now is 1 ankrAVAX = {ratio} AVAX.

You can unstake it anytime and receive your stake and earned rewards after the ~1–28 days unbonding period, depending on validator's closest unlocking date.

While staking, you can also use ankrAVAX for trading and other DeFi opportunities.
token-info.aBNBb:
aBNBb represents your staked BNB and provides liquidity for your staked position.

aBNBb balance in your wallet grows daily to reflect the earned rewards.

Redemption ratio is always 1 aBNBb = 1 BNB.

You can unstake it anytime and receive your stake and earned rewards after the ~7–10 days unbonding period.

While staking, you can also use aBNBb for trading and other DeFi opportunities.
token-info.aBNBc:
ankrBNB represents your staked BNB and provides liquidity for your staked position.

All staking rewards are built into the token price, and ankrBNB grows daily in value, but never in number.

Redemption ratio now is 1 ankrBNB = {ratio} BNB.

You can unstake it anytime and receive your stake and earned rewards after the ~7–10 days unbonding period.

While staking, you can also use ankrBNB for trading and other DeFi opportunities.
token-info.aETHb:
aETHb represents your staked ETH and provides liquidity for your staked position.

aETHb balance in your wallet grows daily to reflect the earned rewards.

Redemption ratio is always 1 aETHb = 1 ETH.

You can redeem your aETHb for ETH and rewards when Ethereum 2.0 enters the 1.5 phase and implements the unstaking functionality.

While staking, you can also use aETHb for trading and other DeFi opportunities.
token-info.aETHBNB:
ankrETH represents your staked ETH and provides liquidity for your staked position.

All staking rewards are built into the token price, and ankrETH grows daily in value, but never in number.

You can redeem your ankrETH for ETH and rewards when Ethereum 2.0 enters the 1.5 phase and implements the unstaking functionality.

While staking, you can also use ankrETH for trading and other DeFi opportunities.
token-info.aETHc:
ankrETH represents your staked ETH and provides liquidity for your staked position.

All staking rewards are built into the token price, and ankrETH grows daily in value, but never in number.

Redemption ratio now is 1 ankrETH = {ratio} ETH.

You can redeem your ankrETH for ETH and rewards when Ethereum 2.0 enters the 1.5 phase and implements the unstaking functionality.

While staking, you can also use ankrETH for trading and other DeFi opportunities.
token-info.asETHc:
asETHc is a new liquid staking token from SSV Trustless Liquid Staking. asETHc represents your staked ETH and provides liquidity for your staked position.

All staking rewards are built into the token price, and asETHc grows daily in value, but never in number.

Redemption ratio now is 1 asETHc = {value} ETH.

You can redeem your asETHc and rewards when Ethereum 2.0 enables unstaking functionality after the Shanghai update in 2023.

Currently, asETHc is only available on testnet.
token-info.aFTMb:
aFTMb represents your staked FTM and provides liquidity for your staked position.

aFTMb balance in your wallet grows daily to reflect the earned rewards.

Redemption ratio is always 1 aFTMb = 1 FTM.

You can unstake it anytime and receive your stake and earned rewards after the 1–35 days unbonding period, depending on validator's closest unlocking date.

While staking, you can also use aFTMb for trading and other DeFi opportunities.
token-info.aFTMc:
ankrFTM represents your staked FTM and provides liquidity for your staked position.

All staking rewards are built into the token price, and ankrFTM grows daily in value, but never in number.
Redemption ratio now is 1 ankrFTM = {ratio} FTM.

You can unstake it anytime and receive your stake and earned rewards after the ~1–35 days unbonding period, depending on validator's closest unlocking date.

While staking, you can also use ankrFTM for trading and other DeFi opportunities.
token-info.aDOTb:
aDOTb represents your staked DOT and provides liquidity for your staked position.

aDOTb balance in your wallet grows daily to reflect the earned rewards.

Redemption ratio is always 1 aDOTb = 1 DOT.

You can unstake it anytime and receive your stake and earned rewards after the ~28 days unbonding period.

While staking, you can also use aDOTb for trading and other DeFi opportunities.
token-info.aKSMb:
aKSMb represents your staked KSM and provides liquidity for your staked position.

aKSMb balance in your wallet grows daily to reflect the earned rewards.

Redemption ratio is always 1 aKSMb = 1 KSM.

You can unstake it anytime and receive your stake and earned rewards after the ~7 days unbonding period.

While staking, you can also use aKSMb for trading and other DeFi opportunities.
token-info.aWNDb:
aWNDb represents your staked WND and provides liquidity for your staked position.

aWNDb balance in your wallet grows daily to reflect the earned rewards.

Redemption ratio is always 1 aWNDb = 1 WND.

You can unstake it anytime and receive your stake and earned rewards after the ~7 days unbonding period.

While staking, you can also use aWNDb for trading and other DeFi opportunities.
token-info.aMATICb:
aMATICb represents your staked MATIC and provides liquidity for your staked position.

aMATICb balance in your wallet grows daily to reflect the earned rewards.

Redemption ratio is always 1 aMATICb = 1 MATIC.

You can unstake it anytime and receive your stake and earned rewards after the ~3–4 days unbonding period.

While staking, you can also use aMATICb for trading and other DeFi opportunities.
token-info.aMATICc:
ankrMATIC represents your staked MATIC and provides liquidity for your staked position.
All staking rewards are built into the token price, and ankrMATIC grows daily in value, but never in number.

Redemption ratio now is 1 ankrMATIC = {ratio} MATIC.

You can unstake it anytime and receive your stake and earned rewards. For MATIC staked on Ethereum, you’ll receive them after the ~{period} days unbonding period, while for MATIC staked on Polygon, you’ll receive them instantly.

While staking, you can also use ankrMATIC for trading and other DeFi opportunities.
token-info.aXDCc:
aXDCc represents your staked XDC and provides liquidity for your staked position. All staking rewards are built into the token price, and aXDCc grows daily in value, but never in number.

Redemption ratio now is 1 aXDCc = {value} XDC.

You can unstake it anytime and receive your stake and earned rewards. Regular unstake takes {period}, while flash unstake is instant.

While staking, you can also use aXDCc for trading and other DeFi opportunities.
token-info.ANKR:
ANKR is the native token of Ankr Network, a decentralized network of nodes providing connections to blockchains for Web3 developers.

Staking rewards accumulate once an epoch - 7 days - in ANKR.

You can claim or restake them for higher APR.
token-info.MGNO:
megaGnosis (mGNO) is a metatoken for GNO, the native Gnosis token. The relation is similar to a wrapped token like WETH to ETH, except there are 32 mGNO in 1 GNO.

As Gnosis is built on Ethereum, staking rewards and unstaking mGNO will be available after the Shanghai update when Ethereum enables this functionality. Approximate date is ~Q3-Q4 2023.

total-info.claimable-tooltip: You can restake or claim your earned rewards for completed epochs only.

provider.highest-apr-tooltip: The highest current Annual Percentage Rate offered by one of the Node provider.
provider.tvl-tooltip: Total value  locked by all stakers to all Node providers.
provider.locking-period-tooltip:
The period of 84–91 days when you cannot withdraw your stake.
When it’s over, your stake keeps generating rewards until you manually unstake it.
provider.24h-rewards-tooltip: The total rewards generated by all validators in the last 24 hours.
provider.30d-rewards-tooltip: The total rewards generated by all validators in the last 30 days.

how-it-works.description: Independent node providers serve blockchain requests from developers, dApps, games, and other sources. But to serve traffic, node providers need a substantial amount of ANKR deposited or ‘staked’ to their nodes to ensure they behave properly and keep within high performance requirements. Earn staking rewards by helping node providers meet the collateral requirements to participate in the protocol.
how-it-works.article-1: Choose a node that matches your risk tolerance. Newer nodes with a smaller staked pool and shorter history on the protocol may have higher APYs but could have more potential for performance issues and slashing, which means missed rewards. Conversely, longstanding providers may offer more modest APYs as rewards are split between more stakers, but less risk is involved.
how-it-works.article-2: After choosing your preferred node, select ‘Stake’ and connect your wallet containing ANKR. Then choose the amount of ANKR you would like to stake.
how-it-works.article-3: Receive staking rewards directly to independent wallets such as MetaMask. You are able to check your staked balance and rewards on the dashboard at any time or unstake your ANKR.
how-it-works.info: Earn staking rewards by helping node providers meet the collateral requirements to participate in the protocol.

claim-dialog.claimable-tooltip: You can restake or claim your earned rewards for completed epochs only.

table.rps-tooltip: Requests per second. Number of RPC calls served by Node provider per second.

empty-state.start-description: Stake ANKR tokens directly to the Ankr Node Provider
empty-state.description-1: Earn ANKR for facilitating Web3 development
empty-state.description-4: Earn participation in ANKR DAO governance

staking.locking-period-tooltip:
The period of 84–91 days when you cannot withdraw your stake.
When it’s over, your stake keeps generating rewards until you manually unstake it.
staking.locking-info: Your new stake will be locked for {value} days. You will earn rewards during this period that will be claimable when the locking period is over.
staking.fee-info: Friendly reminder to make sure the amount you're staking is higher than the current network transaction fee

unstaking.title: Unstake ANKR
unstaking.undelegeting-info: Undelegating process takes about 7 days before you can claim your ANKR.
unstaking.description: This may take a moment; you can close this window.

restake.title: Restake ANKR Rewards
restake.restakable-tooltip:
You can restake your earned rewards for completed epochs only.

Next epoch ends in {value}
restake.locking-info: Your new stake will be locked for {value} days. You will earn rewards during this period that will be claimable when the locking period is over.

claim.title: Claim Rewards
claim.claimable-tooltip: You can claim your earned rewards for completed epochs only.
claim.description: This may take a moment; you can close this window.

usnupported.title: Start staking mGNO
usnupported.description: OKX Wallet doesn't support Gnosis network. Please connect another wallet.

total-info.priority-tips-tooltip: Paid by the sender in addition to the base gas fee. Decreases transaction processing time. Node Providers share a portion of them with stakers who stake with said providers.
total-info.validation-rewards-tooltip: Rewards from transaction fees Node Providers receive for validating transaction blocks. Providers share a portion of them with stakers who stake with said providers.

staking.lock-info:
mGNO will remain locked and illiquid until ~Q4 2023.
This is due to Gnosis plans to enable withdrawals with the upcoming Ethereum Shanghai upgrade. Shanghai is planned in 6–12 months from The Merge that is expected in ~Q3/Q4 2022.
staking.slashing-protection-tooltip: Validator can make a deposit that protects their and your stake slashing. The protection level of this validator is dynamically calculated by the ratio of the total amount of all delegated stakes to the size of the insurance pool.

validation.max-capacity: Validator has reached its maximum capacity and cannot accept any more stakes.
validation.greater-max: Due to validator’s limited capacity, you can stake up to {value}

provider.slashing-protection-tooltip: Validator can make a deposit that protects their and your stake slashing. The protection level of this validator is dynamically calculated by the ratio of the total amount of all delegated stakes to the size of the insurance pool.
provider.insurance-pool-tooltip: The insurance pool is a reserve of staked amounts from both node providers and stakers that can be used to cover possible slashing.
provider.staked-available-tooltip: Amount already delegated to this Validator and free validation capacity.
provider.net-apr-tooltip: The net Annual Percentage Rate (APR) includes validator fees and potential penalties.

unsupported.okx-title: At the moment GNO staking is not compatible with a OKX wallet.

unsupported.title: Start staking SSV-Ethereum
unsupported.description:
SSV-Ethereum Staking is not available with {currentWallet} at the moment.
Please connect another wallet that supports the Goerli testnet network.

stake.info: aXDCc is a reward-bearing token with rewards built in. Redemption ratio grows daily, but quantity never changes. Current redemption ratio is 1 aXDCc = {value} XDC

liquidity-pool.tooltip: Flash unstake pool allows you to instantly unstake and receive your assets. To flash-unstake, you need to stay within the current pool capacity, or regular times will apply.

convert.title: Switch
convert.description: This may take a moment; you can close this window. Once completed you can check out your new {token} exposure on the Ankr Staking Dashboard.

provider-info.title: ETH provider service will no longer be supported.

text.p1: Validating keys will be gradually revoked from September 1st to September 6th.
text.p2: After Sept 6, 2022, your ANKR insurance deposit will be sent back to you automatically. If your insurance deposit was in ETH, you can claim it on the dashboard after Sept. 6th in ankrETH or aETHb. You can also choose to claim your deposit and rewards in ETH after the Shanghai update (following The Merge in 6–12 months), appr. Q2/Q3 2023.

provider-info.rewards-info: Earned rewards can be claimed after ETH2 withdrawals are enabled.

suspend-info.title: Attention!
suspend-info.p1: BNB staking service is temporarily suspended. All other staking works normally!
suspend-info.p2: Please follow us on Twitter: {link}
